name: Active Popcorn
description: You have one minute to speak your piece, and everything will be determined within seconds. Energize yourselves, speak up without hesitation, and win with your words and tenacity.
tag_line: One minute to win it all!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
Usage of offensive and vulgar words should be avoided.
Usage of filler words should be avoided.
The topic will be given on spot.
Repetitive words or ideas are not encouraged.
Participants must adhere to the general rules that will be set by the judges.
Judges’ decisions will be final.

name: Aero Modelling
description: Aeromodelling is an exciting and dynamic field that offers a unique opportunity for students to develop a diverse range of skills across multiple disciplines. Through interactive sessions, this workshop provides a comprehensive understanding of the principles of aerodynamics, electrical engineering, and control systems. Students will learn how to design and build a fully functioning radio-controlled aircraft, gaining valuable experience in problem-solving and critical thinking. It's an exciting and rewarding experience that can inspire the next generation of engineers, designers, and innovators.
tag_line: Learn, invent and transform the sky!

name: Block Chain
description: Blockchain technology is used in various industries, from banking to healthcare. This workshop is designed for individuals who want to learn about the various potential applications and the underlying mechanisms of blockchains. Participants will explore various use cases for blockchain technology, including supply chain management, identity verification, and more. Join us for an interactive workshop to learn more about blockchain.
tag_line: Secure and decentralized record keeping with blockchain

name: Brawl Of Brains
description: Science and Technology revolutionize our lives,but memory, tradition and myth frame our response.It's a perfect combination of smart and fun .You win or you learn- either way it's win-win.
tag_line: Connect the dots and tickle your brains
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.
The team should consist of 2 members only.
Participants are not allowed to use mobile phones or any other electronic devices.
The questions will be in the form of multiple choice, true or false, specific answer questions.
Judges’ decisions will be final.

name: Business marketing
description: Business Marketing is a group event with a maximum of 3 members in a team . Topics or Products will be given on the spot  and students should present the business talk on the given topic like providing quotations   and handling the business of the product given topics.
tag_line: Quantify the quality
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
It is an solo event and team participation is not allowed.
Topics will be given on the spot.
Participants should make the analysis of the profit and loss of the product and estimate the real prices of the product and perform the marketing.
Judge’s decision will be final.

name: CADiz
description: CAD Designing is a team event where students are provided with the model for designing. The participants are asked to design the model within the given time using the software on the participants wish on their own.
tag_line: Design. Create. Innovate.
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.
Only 3 members in a team are allowed.
Topics will be given on spot.
Participants are allowed to use any kind of software for designing.
The participants should complete the design within the given time.
Judge's decision will be final.

name: Call Of Duty
description: Is gaming your domain? Amateur or professional gaming sees no discrimination, only skills, strategy and rules. So gear up for the battle, prepare and clash in the ultimate showdown.
tag_line: The ultimate gaming battleground!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.
The game must be played only using a mobile phone.
Emulators and rooted devices should not be used.
During an ongoing tournament players are not allowed to change their in-game name.
Clan tags before in-game names are allowed to be changed.
Players should have all the maps downloaded prior to the event.
No refund will be provided if the player is kicked out of the server due to glitches or any other cause.
Players should not have any obscene or offensive in-game names.
Matches will be supervised separately to avoid malpractices.

name: Carrom
description: Get ready to strike, flick and pocket your way to victory. A classical game of skill, strategy and precision! It is all about quick reflexes, sharp focus and a steady hand. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a complete amateur, let’s see who’s the coveted Carrom Champion!
tag_line: Hold, Aim and Shoot, cause we strike to win
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event includes general registration of Rs.150 per head.
Only college students are permitted.
Participants should be present at the venue before 10 a.m.
Prior registration is required, either online or on the spot.
Only single entries are permitted and the entry fee is non-refundable.
Matches occur in a 1 vs 1 format.
Each coin carries one point.
Red and a follow will result in 3 points.
Thumbing and Scissoring is allowed.
The matches occur in a knockout format.
Participants scoring the maximum point are considered as the winner.
Organizer’s decision is final.

name: Chess
description: Only a harsh self-evaluation will enable a player to identify his strengths as well as his weaknesses , turning his game up a notch Participate in this test of wits to discover the limits of your mind.
tag_line: Sneak in silence and scream with a 'CHECKMATE'
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
No refund if registration fee is paid.
Latest FIDE rules are followed.
Discipline must be maintained throughout the event.
The tournament will be conducted as a knock-out tournament.
Number of rounds will be decided based on number of participants.
On the spot is allowed until (9:30AM till first round starts)
Clock will be provided.
The duration of the game is 40 minutes.
If a player does more than one illegal move then he will be eliminated from the tournament.
Stalement rule-Draw will be agreed by players is followed.
Touch move law(If a player touches a particular chess piece,then he/she should move that chess piece only) must be strictly followed.
Participants must bring their College ID Card for proof.
All participants are requested to come before (8:00AM).
Organizer’s decision is final.

name: Chordially Yours

name: Choreo Night
description: The stage's heating up, so get your spirits ignited, as it's time for you to put on a costume of confidence and flaunt your moves with your crew. Prepare to leave a mark on the dance floor!

name: CineMania

name: Cinematography
description: Whether you are an ardent admirer of PC Sreeram or find yourself in awe of KV Anand's shots, this workshop is tailored to help you hone your abilities and delve deeper into the creative aspects of visual storytelling. Indulge in the art of cinematography and expand your skill set with our hands-on workshop, while working alongside industry professionals and utilizing top-of-the-line equipment. This program caters to both beginners and intermediate-level cinematographers, providing a comprehensive and inspiring experience that will elevate your craft to new heights.
tag_line: Capture life through lens

name: Cook In Crisis
description: With no flame to fall back on, contestants must bring their A-game and push their culinary limits. From fresh ingredients to favourable flavours, get ready to serve up a storm without even touching the stove! With only culinary skills and creativity to rely on, who will reign supreme in this intense battle of flavours?
tag_line: The fight for culinary fame with no flame.
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.

Each team must consist of a maximum of 2 members.
Participants must bring their own material.
Participants should not bring pre-cooked items.
All participants must leave their working stations clean.

name: Cypher
description: Calling out all high-octane hip-hop dancers! Once you step in, there's no going back. Diss your opponent, not with your words but with your dance. Steal the spotlight with your swings and rap steps.
tag_line: The ultimate dance showdown!

Any form of vulgarity will lead to disqualification.

name: DJ Night
description: Adrenaline rushing, crowd vibing, beams flashing and beats burning. Join the groovy DJ as he plunges you into a night of eternal bliss! The most awaited night where lights go low and spirits get high! Let the ground rumble with sounds that soar to the stars!

name: Digital Art
description: With the rapid advancement of technology, digital art has become an important part of the contemporary art world, and this competition provides a platform for artists to showcase their work to a wider audience!

name: Drone Racing
description: Are you looking for an exhilarating challenge? Then come join us and race your drone through an insane first-person course! Compete with other daring pilots and soak in the thrilling atmosphere as you fight for the top spot. Don't miss out, it's an enthralling event that does not come by often.
tag_line: Dare to defy the grapple of gravity
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.

Only the Pilot and one accompanying member is allowed inside the fly area.
Readymade drones are not permitted.
Maximum frame size of the drone must be 270mm.
Battery capacity must not exceed 14.8v and 3,500mAh.
Carbon fiber and metal propellers are prohibited.
Fail safe switch must be enabled.
The College will not take responsibility for any damage of the drone.
Judges’ decisions will be final.

name: Drone Technology
description: Have you ever thought about building and controlling your own miniature aircraft? If so, this drone technology workshop is perfect for you! You'll learn the basic science behind drones and design a fully functional drone that you can fly one day. Drones have a wide range of potential applications, from package delivery to the defense industry. This interactive event allows participants to engage and gain practical knowledge about drone technology.
tag_line: Be the part of the aerial revolution

name: Duo code
description: Coding duos! Two participants are paired and are given a problem to solve. The duo should take turns to code the solution. But the catch is, they can’t be together at the same time. As one person codes, the other person is isolated. Swaps occur at regular intervals and the first duo to solve the problem wins.
tag_line: Code your way to victory
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.
A team must consist of two members in a team.
Participants are requested to register in advance.

Only one participant per team is allowed to code at the particular time and can be swapped after a given time.
There is only one round.

name: Frame-Spot
description: Analyze the given frames and arrive at the bigger picture. Discover the hidden message in each picture, make the connections, and learn what the final frame whispers to you.

name: Fullstack Web-Development
description: A website and a server designed by a single person, is that even possible? Well, if you know about full-stack development, it is! In this workshop learn how to program a website and also gain knowledge on creating exclusive databases and servers for the website that you designed. The workshop will also focus on best practices for software development, such as version control, testing, and debugging. By the end of the workshop, participants will have a solid understanding of full-stack development and be able to build their own web applications from scratch.

name: Futsal
description: The sun is out and the fans are on.Time to break out a fresh pair of kicks and get ready for your next futsal match! Show some love for your fellow ballers and share a high-five today. Break a leg!
tag_line: Pride and Passion meets Success.With all your force,hit. Turn your spirit for a better game. Orange heroes on the ground.
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
The Entry fee for this event is ₹500 per team.
Entry fee of 500 should be paid beforehand through net banking (on spot payment not allowed).
Winners would be rewarded a cash prize of Rs.5000.
Runners would be rewarded a cash prize of Rs.3000.
Team should report at 8:30a.m or else the team will be eliminated.
Only College students are permitted.
College Id card is mandatory for all players.
Each team must have 5 players and 3 subs.
Knockout match on March 31.
Playoffs will be held on April 1.
Rolling substitution is allowed.
Timing 8-2-8. (first half 8 minutes - break 2 minutes - second half 8 minutes).
No accommodation is provided.
Re-entry is not allowed.
Entry fee will not be refunded.
Full kit is compulsory.
In case of natural calamities like rain or strom registration fee would be refunded.

name: Gully  Cricket
description: The hallmark of a great captain is the ability to win the toss, at the right time.Cricket is the one game that can unify a nation in the depths of despair. Swing to the fences, take the field, rule the streets and be the crown jewel of Street Cricket.
tag_line: Make your trick- Hat-trick
rules: The Entry fee for this event is ₹300 Per team.
The team-head should register for the event, on behalf of the team.
Each squad must have six members.
The entirety of the contest will be six overs.
Hitting six is considered as Out.
There will be no singles, and only fours will be counted.
In case of natural calamities like rain or storm registration fee would be refunded.
organizer’s decision is final.

name: Hall Of Humour
description: Laughter is the best medicine, they say. Do you agree? We surely do. With that said, we bring to you Takshashila's Hall of Humour, your one stop destination to say good riddance to all your worries.
tag_line: Tonight’s menu: Comedy and satire!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.

The stage will be given solely for Stand-up comedy and other acts of humor will not be permitted.
Dark humor and adult jokes will not be tolerated.
Usage of unparliamentary words will lead to immediate disqualification.

name: Human Plato
description: All the world's a stage and all the fields are playgrounds. In this room-sized board, you are the pawn, and we are the players. It's a kill or be killed situation, will you be the last man standing?
tag_line: Will you succumb to the snakes or climb to the top.
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
Duration: 30 minutes.
The game to be played is ‘Snakes and Ladders’.
Participants will take turns to roll the dice and move their counter forward the number of spaces shown on the dice.
If the counter lands at the bottom of a ladder, you can move up to the top of the ladder.
If the counter lands on the head of a snake, you must slide down to the bottom/tail of the snake.
The first player to get to the space that says 'Home' is the winner, else the person with the highest score will be declared the winner.
Organizer’ decision will be final.

name: IOT & Embedded Systems with AWS
description: In this workshop, you will learn about designing and applying IoT systems. You will work on real-world projects and gain hands-on experience in industries like healthcare, agriculture, and transportation. By the end of the workshop, you will have gained valuable knowledge and skills that can be applied to your own projects and career development. Join us to explore the world of IoT and its endless possibilities!

name: IPL Auction

tag_line: Players on sale, perform the trade!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.

The quiz will be based on IPL records.
The top 10 teams will be moving on to the auction round.
The selected 10 teams will be each asked to pick a cricket team from the lot.
Each team will be given 100 crores [Digital prop currency]
The value of the retained players of each selected cricket team will be reduced from the given 100 crores.
Each team should pick 15 - 23 players each.
Each team should prepare their 11’s at the end of the auction with a maximum of 4 foreign players.
Winners will be selected based on players current form and record.
Judges’ and organizers' decisions are final.

name: Line Follower
description: Where precision meets speed, steer your way to the end-line. Stay on track and you'll stay in the game. Wander off track and you'll have to walk out. Gather your courage and components! Are you up for this rip-roaring race where only the fast and furious finishes first?
tag_line: Stay on track and steer to success!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.

Track includes T-joints, dotted lines, acute, obtuse angles and some color changes in the line.
Bot should be operated on a battery source.
Duration allotted for each team is 5 minutes.
In case of any deviation from the path, the team should start from the last checkpoint and a maximum of 2 attempts will be provided for the same within the allotted time.
The bot should not be immobilized for more than 30 seconds.
This event is evaluated on a time basis.

rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.

name: Melodic Mavericks

description: Create a meme that makes people stop scrolling and stop sharing! Make magical memes that make people roll in laughter. Will your meme be the next viral hit?
tag_line: Let's meme-ify the world!
rules: The memes submitted must be an original work of the individual.
The first round will be an online evaluation round where the participants will have to upload their memes at the time of registration.
The memes should be submitted on or before the 28th of March 2023.
Final round will be held offline and participants have to create a meme on the spot.
Themes and templates for the final round will be provided by the organizers.
Judges’ decision will be final.

name: Memories Of Murder
description: Do you have what it takes to solve the case and bring justice to the departed? Test your wits to see if your detective skills are as good as Rust Cohle's. Dive into the case files and piece together the clues to uncover the killer. Are you up for the challenge?
tag_line: Unravel the scarlet thread of murder running through the colourless skein of life.
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.
Time allotted for each team is 10 min.
Each team must consist of 3 to 4 members.
Each team will have a time limit of 3 to 4 minutes to inspect the crime scene.
Suspects’ statements will be played to the teams.
Team must discuss the case within the specified time.
Mobile phones and other Gadgets will not be allowed within the premises.
For each hint asked by the team, accountable points will be deducted as per jury team.

name: Musical Night
description: Crazy nights make the best memories.  Is there anything better than singing along to your favorite song in a crowd with thousands of strangers? Come celebrate with us as we groove to the sounds of Indian Cinema.
tag_line: Let the magic of music help you move through haze of pure delight
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
It is mandatory to have a college ID for participation.
Registration falls under the general registration category.
Participants who do not register will not be allowed to participate.
Vandalism of property must be avoided at all times.
You are responsible for the safety of your own property.
Any unlawful acts or habits are strictly prohibited and must be avoided.

name: Mystical Scribbles
description: From pencils to markers, let colors fly and let your imagination run wild and free. Doodle your way to fame.
tag_line: Get inspired, pick up a pen and let the doodling begin!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
Duration: 60 minutes.
Participants can use colours to make their doodles vibrant.
Participants should bring their own material.
A3 drawing sheets will be provided.

name: Navarasa
description: Imagine yourself in the given situation and re-enact the scene with yourself as the character. All eyes are on you, awaken your inner actor and leave the audience awestruck.
tag_line: Unleash your inner actor!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
The event consists of two rounds - Prelims and Finals.
Duration for Prelims - a maximum of 3 minutes.
Duration for Finals - a maximum of 7 minutes.
The situation to act on, will be given on the spot.
Vulgar, offensive and explicit content should be avoided.
No preparation time will be given.

name: Neuron Twisters
description: If you think you’ve seen it all when it comes to puzzles, think again!With cryptic crosswords, brain-bursting sudokus and more, only the most astute and strategic thinkers will prevail. With high stakes, and even higher rewards, it’s time to step up and show the world your puzzle power!
tag_line: Decipher, Decrypt, derive the solution in a bit.
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
The event consists of 4 sets of puzzles.
Puzzles: Sudoku, Word grid, Calcudoku, Crossword.
Each round will abide by its respective rules.
For buzzers, participants are asked to join in https://buzzin.live/ and the host screen will be projected on the screen.
Requirements will be provided on spot during the event organizers.
First to complete all four puzzles will be declared as the winners.

name: OMG(Oh My Graffiti)
description: Where every stroke tells a story, unlock the creativity within and unleash your vision. Sketch your way to glory ‘cause the canvas is calling for a masterpiece.
tag_line: Blank walls are a shared canvas and we're all artists

Duration: 60 minutes.
Only graphite or charcoal pencils are allowed as drawing mediums.
Participants should bring their own materials.
Drawing sheets will be provided by the event organizers.

name: On-Air
description: Radio affects most intimately, person to person, offering a world of unspoken communication between the writer- speaker and listener.Step into the spotlight, grab the microphone, take a moment, and be a part of the legacy.
tag_line: Grab the microphone and talk to the world!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
The time limit of the performance is 2 to 4 minutes.
The participant can perform on any topic of their choice in this round.
Participants are not allowed to use abusive language in their performance.
Controversial and political topics should be avoided.
The time limit for the performance is 5 minutes.
The topic will be given on the spot.
Preparation time of 1 minute will be provided.
The judge's decisions will be final.

name: Pandora's box
description: Pandora’s Box is a team event of two members where the circuit output will be given on spot and the participants are asked to design the circuit using the given chips, circuit boards and present the output of the circuit assembled.
tag_line: Reviving appliances, restoring functionality, and simplifying your life
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.
Maximum of 2 members are allowed in a team.
Random boxes are to be selected by the team consisting of circuit design and components.
Participants are asked to build the circuits using the components, provided within the given time.
Judge’s decision will be final.

name: Paper presentation
description: Paper presentation is a two-member competition where each team is required to provide a written representation of your idea in English, about a given theme and present it with a presentation (PowerPoint) in front of the judges.
tag_line: A well presented paper is worth a thousand words.
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.
A maximum of two members are permitted per team.
Participants are requested to register in advance.
Abstract should not exceed one page and the presentation should not exceed 20 slides.
Participants are requested to bring along 2 hard copies of the paper to be submitted, on the day of  the event.
A team can have students from different colleges.
The abstract mail should contain the abstract references,  your email id and mobile number.
Any kind of plagiarism leads to immediate disqualification.
Judges’ decisions will be final.

name: Picture Perfect
description: Are you passionate about photography? Come and join us for an exciting event that celebrates the art of capturing moments through the lens. Whether you're a seasoned photographer or just starting out, you're sure to find inspiration here.
tag_line: Framing Serene Life Moments
rules: Only one entry per person.
Photos must be submitted through google forms on or before 28th of March 2023.
Photos should not contain any watermark.
DSLR and mobile phones are permitted.
Photos should not be taken from any online sources or plagiarised.
Selfies, casual photos and other irrelevant content will not be considered.
Basic editing including color correction, cropping is acceptable.
Judges’ decision will be final.

name: A Pirate's Dilemma
description: It is better to meet danger than to wait for it.He who is on a lee shore and foresees a hurricane, stands out to sea and encounters a storm to avoid a shipwreck.
tag_line: Survive the shipwreck with your power of persuasion
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
Time limit is 3 minutes per person.
The event will have two rounds- Prelims and Finals.
The top 8 members will be qualified for the finals.
Participants are not allowed to talk about political facts in the event.
Participants are not allowed to use abusive or offensive language.
Judges’ decisions will be final.

name: Plush
description: Pitch your pace as you walk with pride and prowess. Can your charm convoke the critics and collect the cheers? Powerful, pleasant and picturesque, is how it must be. Flaunt your fashion in this fest of elegance and ecstasy!
tag_line: Get ready to be wowed as you Step-Out in Style
rules: The registration fees is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This registration is not for participation purpose, it is only for viewing.

name: Poetry
description: Verse on paper, heart's emotion, Rhymes and rhythm, flowing motion, With words and thoughts, a sweet devotion, A poem, a story, pure devotion.
tag_line: Let the words flow through thee!
rules: The poems should consist of a title.
The poems must not exceed 40 lines in length excluding the title.
Plagiarism is not allowed.
Poetry can be written in any poetic style and on any subject.
A poem in its entirety must be an original work by the person entering the event.
Any entry containing cliché, overused phrases will not be accepted.
Poems containing language that is vulgar, offensive, or wholly inappropriate will not be accepted.
Judges’ decision will be final.

name: RC- Racing
description: Competition is what makes us work harder. Crash tests, pit stops and obstacle courses. Race to the finish line while revving your engines. Creativity and strategy packs a punch in this RC race!
tag_line: Feel the rush, embrace the speed, dance to the adrenaline.
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.
A maximum of 4 members per team is allowed.
Readymade bots will be eliminated.
The permitted dimensions of the bot is 30cm*30cm*30cm.
First round will be a tug of war and in the second round the Track including ramps and other obstacles.
The bot should be operated on a battery source.
Both wireless and wired configuration is permitted.
Extra batteries and other accessories will not be provided at the venue.
Any Physical damage of the bot will lead to disqualification.
Second round will be  evaluated on a time basis.
Only 2 members from the team will be allowed to step on the track.
Judges’ decisions will be final.

name: Rap-a-thon
description: Just get on the mic and spit those rhymes and better go capture this moment and hope it don't pass. Lose yourself in the music, the moment, You own it, you better never let it go. You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow. Keep spilling these raps long till you collapse. Wake the real slim shady in you.
tag_line: Mic in your hand, the world in your feet. Join us for a night of lyrical heat.
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.
The event has 2 rounds- prelims and finals.
Duration for Prelims: A maximum of 2 minutes.
Duration for Finals: A maximum of 5 minutes.
Individual entries as well as team entries are allowed.
Participants must have with them the rhythm to which they will be rapping.
The raps can be multilingual.
The artist must not include any explicit words in his/her lyrics.
Usage of offensive language, naming a particular person or a defined group of people (religions, castes etc.), usage of any socially objectionable language is strictly prohibited.
The Judges’ decisions will be final.

name: Real To Reel
description: Videograph your views on our college and capture clips to project your perspective. Summarize the fervour and magnificence that are rife in our campus!
tag_line: Make reality beautiful through your videography skills.
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
The video should not exceed 60 seconds.
The reel must be an original creation.
Footage that was shot outside the college campus is not permitted.
Only mobile phones can be used for shooting.
Voiceover is not allowed, only background music and songs are allowed.
Submission should be done before the deadline.
The reels must be recorded in the aspect ratio of 9:16.
Only one submission per participant is allowed.
Judges’ decision will be final.

name: Screenplay and Direction
description: Are you an aspiring filmmaker looking for the chance to learn from the best? Look no further than our upcoming workshop on screenplay and direction hosted by a renowned filmmaker. This is your chance to learn from the best and gain practical experience in all aspects of filmmaking, including writing a screenplay, directing actors, and post-production. Join  us for this unique chance to learn and grow as a filmmaker.

name: Script Writing
description: Can a movie truly capture your emotions and move you to tears, sending shivers down your spine, regardless of whether it's Harry Potter or Ponniyan Selvan? Only a well-crafted story can truly captivate an audience and win their hearts. Attend our Script Writing Workshop led by renowned script writers and learn the art of crafting compelling stories for film, television, and other mediums. Join us for a fun and informative workshop that will help you turn your ideas into captivating stories.
tag_line: Craft unforgettable stories with your screenplay

name: Scriptography
description: Anything and everything begins with a script. A building ought to crumble without a foundation. Similarly, a story is sure to sink without a script to call its own. Do you have what it takes to showcase your stupendous scriptography skills?
tag_line: Write the movie of your dreams!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
Participants will be assigned a genre and will have to write a script on the spot.
Participants can write the script in either Tamil or English.
Each script should be in typed format while presenting to the judge.
Participants will have a maximum of 1 hour to complete the script.
30 minutes will be given for creating the script from scratch.
30 minutes will be given for the narration of the script.
Judges' decisions will be final.

name: Stress Interview
description: Just like mentally strong people, we must be able to thrive regardless of any added tension. We have to put our stress in perspective, replace negative thoughts with positive ones and be proud of our achievements.
tag_line: Feel the pressure of scrutiny!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.

The game ends when the participant shows any sign of anger and irritation.

name: TK TV

tag_line: Steal the spotlight and become a star
rules: Round 1 - Channel Surfing.
The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.

Vulgarity in any form will lead to elimination.

Round 2 - Adzap.
Usage of mobiles and other electronic gadgets is strictly prohibited.
Vulgarity in any form will lead to elimination.

Participants must perform for at least 2 minutes.

name: Talking Head

This is a high-octane, ear-splitting, heart-pumping extravaganza that leaves you wanting for more. name: Therukoothu

name: Times of TK
description: Takshashila is buzzing with excitement - and you're the one who gets to capture it all! From the grand opening ceremony to the final curtain call, Times of TK is your chance to tell the story of our cultural fest through your own unique perspective. So grab your notepad, camera and stylus to prepare a promising front page that will go down in history.

rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.

name: Treasure Hunt

rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.

Clues should be collected in the correct number order.
Clues will be placed only inside the college premises.
Participants must not damage college property.
The first team to capture the flag wins.

name: UI & UX Designing
description: UI refers to the design of all the interactive elements in a website and UX is the entire interaction with the final product, these two go hand in hand. To build a good website, you need an impressive and easy-to-interact UI and UX. The participants of this workshop engage in hands-on activities such as user research, design sprints, wireframing, and prototyping to gain insights and make design decisions.
tag_line: Create the ultimate user experience

name: Vaayai Moodi Pesavum
description: Are you a master of muttering tales , with your tongue tied. Can you express your emotions in an extravagant manner, with no words but only nonverbal cues? Then Vaayai Moodi Pesavum provides you with the perfect stage to prove yourselves!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.

Acts centered on controversial or sensitive issues are prohibited.

name: Valorant
description: Enter the virtual arena of Valorant, where the intensity is high and competition is fierce. Every move counts and every shot matters. Join us for the gaming event that will test your skills, challenge your strategy and leave you hungry for more. With the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat, this is Valorant at its best.
tag_line: Choose your agent, steady your aim, shoot the heads and grab the fame!
rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.

Update your riot client and valorant game to the latest version prior to the tournament.
No refund will be provided if the player is kicked out of the server due to glitches or any other causes.

name: Vechicle Building
description: The sound of a vehicle throttling, ready to rip through the roads is beautiful. In this vehicle building workshop learn how to design and assemble the components of a vehicle and also learn about the engineering aspects in a vehicle like tuning the engine and more. Our experienced instructors will guide you through the process, teaching you how to use tools and materials to create a functional and unique vehicle.

description: Soar up to the skies, beyond the nets and spike past any obstacles in your way. In this game of 12, can you lead your team to victory and climb your way to the top? You won't know unless you try!
tag_line: Above the net and beyond the blocks
rules: The Entry fee for this event is ₹500 Per team.
Winners would be rewarded a cash prize of Rs.5000.
Runners would be rewarded a cash prize of Rs.3000.
The team-head should register for the event, on behalf of the team.
The matches will occur in a knockout format.
Matches will occur on March 30.
Each team should have 6 players and 3 substitutes.
Before the start of the match both the captains have to give the name of all the 9 players to the referee.
The total points in one single set is 30.
The entire team should enter the campus before reporting time(8.30 AM) or else the team will be eliminated.
The participants will be permitted to participate only if they have a complete kit inclusive of safety pads.
All the clubs are allowed, provided that they are college students.
No accommodation is provided.
Re-entry is not allowed.
In case of natural calamities like rain or storm registration fee would be refunded.

rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.

name: World of Weebs
description: Prove your anime prowess in this epic anime quiz! From Naruto's hidden jutsus to the heroic quirks of My Hero Academia, cover everything you need to prove yourself as a true anime fan. Gather your nakama, channel your inner anime protagonist, and let's see who will emerge as the victor in the World of Weebs! Dattebayo!

rules: The registration fee for participants is INR 150 per day along with the proof of payment (screenshot), granting them access to participate in an unlimited number of events on that day.
This event comes under general registration i.e, Rs. 150 per head.
Each team can have a maximum of 2 members.
